title: Johannes Gutenberg
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : Johannes Gutenberg**

**Johannes Gutenberg**

(circa 1398 - Feb 3, 1468) Inventor of the [letterpress](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/letterpress) printing technique using metal alloy [movable type](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/movable%20type) and a press. He is accredited with producing the first western book using this technique, the "42-Line" (aka "Mainz" or "Gutenberg") [Bible](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bible). His letterpress printing technique was an amalgam of different technologies available at the time including wine presses and metal alloys.

See also [Johann Gutenberg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131124/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Johann%20Gutenberg)

for more info:  
 [http://www.gutenbergdigital.de/gudi/start.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131124/http:/www.gutenbergdigital.de/gudi/start.htm "http://www.gutenbergdigital.de/gudi/start.htm")
